description: Ultra soft premium beanie made in Europe. This beanie is the perfect accessory to pack for all your next outdoor adventure. We use RWS certified 100% 19,5 micron extra fine merino wool in a 3-layer lightweight knitted construction because merino wool is warm, soft on the skin and is anti-odor and temperature regulating. The inside is fully fleece lined with polyester for ultra-soft warmth and wind protection.<br><br>Made with 100% merino wool. The inside lining is a Bluesign approved 100% recycled brushed polyester fleece. This beanie has a regular fit.
name: /29 Heavy Merinoull Contrast Beanie
